languages.text: "Топка канула в небытие, и теперь те, кто получает сообщение с "Семи кровавых стигмат", либо не могут его расшифровать, либо не желают испытывать удачу, соваясь в это дурное место. Но у вас-то с удачей все в порядке, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Топка канула в небытие, и теперь те, кто получает сообщение с "Семи кровавых стигмат", либо не могут его расшифровать, либо не желают испытывать удачу, соваясь в это дурное место. Но у вас-то с удачей все в порядке, не так ли?"

languages.text: "And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"
languages.original_text: "Топка канула в небытие, и теперь те, кто получает сообщение с "Семи кровавых стигмат", либо не могут его расшифровать, либо не желают испытывать удачу, соваясь в это дурное место. Но у вас-то с удачей все в порядке, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"

"And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"

"And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"

"And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"

"And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"

languages.text: « C'est ainsi que la légende de la Fournaise est née. Ceux qui reçoivent les messages du croiseur Sept stigmates sanglants sont incapables de les déchiffrer ou ne veulent tout simplement pas prendre le risque d'aller fouiner dans cet endroit maudit. Mais vous, la chance vous sourit, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "And so the Stoke became history, and those who receive messages from the Seven Bloody Stigmata either can't decipher them or don't want to try their luck by poking their heads into that forsaken place. But you definitely have luck on your side, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est ainsi que la légende de la Fournaise est née. Ceux qui reçoivent les messages du croiseur Sept stigmates sanglants sont incapables de les déchiffrer ou ne veulent tout simplement pas prendre le risque d'aller fouiner dans cet endroit maudit. Mais vous, la chance vous sourit, n'est-ce pas ? »
